synopsis.text: Magica Record: Puella Magi Madoka Magica Side Story Season 2 -The Eve of Awakening- witnesses the journey of Madoka Kaname and Sayaka Miki to the tumultuous Kamihama City, with the hope of rescuing their dear friend Mami Tomoe. Homura Akemi, filled with renewed optimism, joins them on their mission, having heard that the city offers salvation for magical girls. However, Kamihama is in chaos, with the Wings of Magius and their adversaries locked in an escalating conflict. As the city teeters on the brink, Yachiyo Nanami relentlessly searches for the vanished Iroha Tamaki, suspecting the involvement of the mysterious magical girl organization. In a surprising turn of events, Yachiyo receives unexpected assistance in her quest. As unsettling incidents unfold at an alarming pace, old and new allies unite to thwart the sinister machinations of the Wings of Magius. This recap episode condenses the events of the first seven episodes of the TV series, offering viewers a succinct yet captivating summary of the story so far.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
